name: Luria Federation
startIntroPart1: Greetings. The Luria Federation has been established. It is time for you to make a great Federation colony. Good luck.
startIntroPart2: I will be out of here now. See you later!
declaringWar: You are a threat to the Federation. You must be eliminated.
attacked: You are a threat to the Federation! We will defend ourselves until the end!
defeated: You win. Please leave the image stash intact.
introduction: Hello. I come from the Luria Federation. Would you like this USB stick full of Anne Hidalgo images?
tradeRequest: Accept for stonks, reject for not stonks.

name: Fumo Empire
startIntroPart1: The Fumo Empire has created a new colony on this world. Will you be able to conquer this world and stop the Luria Federation?
startIntroPart2: All image stashes you find are to be destroyed immediately. No exceptions.
declaringWar: We suspect you of harboring secret LuriaFed image stashes. Our soldiers are coming for an inspection.
attacked: I will make sure that the souls of every dead soldier you have suffer eternally in hell.
defeated: You have eliminated my colony. Be wary, for I will come back.
uniques: Unhappiness from number of Cities doubled
